issue.title: [CF 814] Loss of text label
issue.body:
Various buttons just won't display a text label. I'm not sure if I'm doing something wrong.

This icon:

^1^T^SUnit^Smouseover ^SOnlyMine^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SRejuvenation;~`Regrowth ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SSPELLCD ^SName^SSwiftmend ^t^N2^T ^SType^SMANAUSABLE ^SName^SSwiftmend ^t^N3^T ^SType^SSPELLRANGE ^SUnit^Smouseover ^SName^SSwiftmend ^t^Sn^N3 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^SE ^t^t^t^SCustomTex^SSwiftmend ^SEnabled^B ^t^N62058^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

... should display the same as this one:

^1^T^SUnit^Sfocus ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SRejuvenation;~`Regrowth ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SSPELLCD ^SName^SSwiftmend ^t^N2^T ^SType^SMANAUSABLE ^SName^SSwiftmend ^t^N3^T ^SType^SSPELLRANGE ^SUnit^Sfocus ^SName^SSwiftmend ^t^Sn^N3 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^SE ^t^t^t^SCustomTex^SSwiftmend ^SEnabled^B ^SOnlyMine^B ^t^N62058^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

They're even copied one from the other, just with the unit changed. But the second button properly displays an E text label (indicating my keybind for that ability) while the first button does not.

I am currently using 6.2.0., although it's been an ongoing problem I've just worked around previously.


> Posted by CurseForge user solitha | Imported from CurseForge issue #814 | Raw

comments.body:
Additional information, that issue happened when the checked unit like below:

Quote:

vehicle; targettarget; mouseover; mouseovertarget


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

I have seen this a few times as well, but unfortunately, I haven't got the slightest clue why it is happening. I have tried upping the frame level on the text container but it hasn't had any effect.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Hmm. In this case it is specific to mouseover. Identical bars using target, focus, and player (me) don't have a problem. I'm not sure that explains ALL of it, since this is the first set of mouseover icons I've made, and I'm fairly certain I've had the problem on other icons.


> Posted by CurseForge user solitha

If this issue is still happening to anybody and you have more information about how to reproduce it, please comment and I will re-open this ticket.

In the mean time, I don't (actively) play WoW anymore so I'm not going to get a chance to reproduce it myself considering how infrequent and random this issue is, so I am closing this ticket as it has no hope of being solved without more information.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
